name: Highest educational attainment of either parent of doctorate recipients:  1970–2020
description: Highest educational attainment of either parent of doctorate recipients:  1970–2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Percentages may not sum to 100 due to rounding and doctorate recipients who reported "not applicable/unknown" for both father's and mother's education.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
